name: Samantha
placeOfBirth: Ramirezview, United States Minor Outlying Islands
description: Samantha is a hazel-eyed llama with gray hair, standing 103 cm tall. Originally from Ramirezview, United States Minor Outlying Islands, Samantha enjoys hiking, dancing, knitting. Known for their calm and friendly personality, Samantha is a beloved member of the llama community.
